name: Grasping Luna-Acrylic painting 12x12
description:
This painting was done on a 12x12inch canvas, using acrylic paint. 
This is the very FIRST painting I've done using the traditional media, I have mainly created digital paintings up until this point. However, I find that the traditional style painting is a lot more fun and allows for more interesting paintings at times. This painting was inspired by Luna. I love the way the moon looks and I want to make many, many more paintings of the moon in the future.

*SHIPS FREE*

name: "Raven n Luna"-Acrylic Painting, 24x36'' canvas
description:
This is a 36x24inch painting, which has been painted on a primed canvas. It was inspired by my obsession with the moon. Enjoy.

*SHIPS FREE*

name: "Itami Grief"-Acrylic Painting, 24x36''inch canvas
description:
The first in a series to come, representing Itami.
This is an Acrylic painting, done on a 24x36inch canvas.
The painting is more vivid in person, I'll try to capture a better image soon. The ,main colors used in this painting are Yellow, Pink, and Black.

Please visit and follow my blog for updates on upcoming paitnings at DetricksArt.blogspot.com

name: "Give Peace A Chance"-Acrylic Painting, 16x20''inch canvas
description:
Size:16x20inch canvas 
Paint used:Acrylic 
This painting was inspired by John Lennon's famous song tittle'd "Give peace a chance". One of my favorite John Lennon songs. On top of that, I also wanted to play with the colors for a change, instead of taking things seriously I decided to have a little fun. I hear that sometimes its important to let the colors control the painting, rather then the painting controlling the colors, if that makes any sense. 


The letters in the top right corner are barely visible, but they read "G.A.P.C" which means gives peace a chance. As for everything else, well I believe some stuff should be left for interpretation :) 
thanks for viewing.

All paintsings are shipped for *FREE* to anywhere in the US(if you are an international buyer please message me before buying, thank you.)

name: "abstract impression Lennon"-Acrylic painting, 16x20''inch Canvas
description:
This a a painting I made of one of my favorite artist of all time. People find it weird that I listen to such "old" music at my age, but John Lennons music and messages are just so amazing that I think more people of today would listen to him if they actually gave him a chance. 

This painting was made with acrylic paint on a 16x20 inch canvas. If you like this painting then please purchase it, but if you're not financially able to do that at the moment it is understandable. But don't worry because I will be making a lot of John Lennon art in the upcoming months and years, so please follow my blog for updates on my paintings. www.deitrichsart.blogspot.com 

Notice: Prints are not available for this painting, I'm only selling the original piece. 
I do not mind prints being made for sell by the person who buys this painting. 
Thank you.

All paintsings are shipped for FREE to anywhere in the US(international buyers please message me before buying, thank you).
